name: actualcombat-book2
description: ```javascript const canadianDollar = 0.91; function roundTwo(amount) {  return Math.round(amount * 100) / 100; } // 挂载到exports上 exports.canadianToUS = canadian => roundTwo(canadian * canadianDollar); exports.USToCanadian = us => roundTwo(us / canadianDollar);  ```
